Returns: True if at least one link is found and applied.
Parameters: TextView: TextView whose text is to be marked-up with links
int: Mask to define which kinds of links will be searched.
addLinks(android.widget.TextView, int).Description: Scans the text of the provided TextView and turns all occurrences of the link types indicated in the mask into clickable links. If matches are found the movement method for the TextView is set to LinkMovementMethod.

Returns: True if at least one link is found and applied.
Parameters: Spannable: Spannable whose text is to be marked-up with links
int: Mask to define which kinds of links will be searched.
addLinks(android.text.Spannable, int).Description: Scans the text of the provided Spannable and turns all occurrences of the link types indicated in the mask into clickable links. If the mask is nonzero, it also removes any existing URLSpans attached to the Spannable, to avoid problems if you call it repeatedly on the same text.

ClassDesc: LinkifyCompat brings in Linkify improvements for URLs and email addresses to older API levels.
